text:
Probal [10:40 AM]
hi i am relatively new and sorry if iam asking something dumb
i have custom module, is there anyway i can print the variable in the custom module outside of the custom module
for example the module inputs dates(event duration ) and links(external) to various events
and i want to print those dates on my post page of my blog for the respective events

i did try to directly print the variable and snippet but it didnt work.
thanks in advance
